Name: Shri Venkateswara Temple
Description: One of the richest and most visited temples in India.

Localizations.LocalizedDescription: One of the richest and most visited temples in India.
भारत के सबसे अमीर और सबसे अधिक देखे जाने वाले मंदिरों में से एक।

Name: Kashi Vishwanath Temple
Description: One of the holiest temples dedicated to Lord Shiva located in Varanasi.

Localizations.LocalizedDescription: One of the holiest temples dedicated to Lord Shiva located in Varanasi.
वाराणसी में स्थित भगवान शिव को समर्पित सबसे पवित्र मंदिरों में से एक।

Name: Jagannath Temple
Description: Famous temple in Puri known for its annual Rath Yatra festival.

Localizations.LocalizedDescription: Famous temple in Puri known for its annual Rath Yatra festival.
पुरी में प्रसिद्ध मंदिर जो वार्षिक रथ यात्रा उत्सव के लिए जाना जाता है।
